Obtain the ACCESS (A Central Computerized Enforcement Service System) Certification within 6(six) months of hire. Noise level in the office is moderately quiet. This is a continuous process. The Police department will conduct interviews on an as needed basis as vacancies occur. A one year eligibility list will be established requiring a minimum passing score of 70%.The City of Renton is dedicated to building an inclusive, informed city with opportunities for all. In alignment with that goal, the City has adopted an anonymous application process that prevents hiring managers from seeing personal identifiers, including candidates' names, addresses, and other similar information. Please make sure to submit a complete, detailed, and updated job application. While resumes and cover letters will not be used in the initial screening, you may be asked to provide them prior to the interview process. Please be prepared to submit this if requested.
